links.text: "But... but... *that's* not in any of the ancient texts! How am I supposed to protect my bookstore from *that*?!"

links.title: Half Light: "She's too afraid to even say the wo..."
links.text: She's too afraid to even say the word.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Tell her the truth -- it's out of h..."
links.text: Tell her the truth -- it's out of her hands.

links.title: Volition: "Whatever you do, don't take away he..."
links.text: Whatever you do, don't take away her hope -- the only weapon against *total absence*.

links.title: You: ""You can't protect it -- not agains..."
links.text: "You can't protect it -- not against *pale*. Close up the shop and try to get as far away from this thing as possible."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Close... the shop? But it's all I..."
links.text: "Close... the shop? But it's all I have! No, there *must* be a way..."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Especially now that Annette is set..."
links.text: "Especially now that Annette is settling in at school again. She's finally making friends in this place!" She looks at her daughter, quietly studying in the corner of the shop. "No, we can't leave Martinaise. We can't."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Thank you for your help, in any ca..."
links.text: "Thank you for your help, in any case. You're welcome back here anytime."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Thank you for your help, in any ca..."
links.text: "Thank you for your help, in any case. You're welcome back here anytime."

links.title: You: ""You can protect it with hope, by r..."
links.text: "You can protect it with hope, by refusing to give up. That's what people have done in the past -- by building a church, a place of worship around this thing."

links.title: Plaisance: ""You're *right*, officer. I mustn't..."
links.text: "You're *right*, officer. I mustn't lose faith -- especially now that Annette is finally settling in at school and making friends." She looks at her daughter, quietly studying in the corner of the shop. "No, we can't just leave!"

links.title: Plaisance: ""Besides, didn't I have some Seolit..."
links.text: "Besides, didn't I have some Seolite hope catchers around here somewhere...? I must find them; everything will be alright if I can just find them."

links.title: Plaisance: ""You're *right*, officer. I can't j..."
links.text: "You're *right*, officer. I can't just leave everything -- after all this work! This little bookstore has become the *cornerstore* of our neighbourhood -- I can't just jump the ship and leave."

links.title: You: ""You'll have to find your own answe..."
links.text: "You'll have to find your own answer. I've spent too long on this quest as it is."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Yes, you've certainly done your pa..."
links.text: "Yes, you've certainly done your part. I've come so far... I can't give up now..."

links.title: You: ""I'm afraid all I can tell you is t..."
links.text: "I'm afraid all I can tell you is this -- you must leave Martinaise immediately. It's too dangerous to stay."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Leave?" She blinks twice, mulling..."
links.text: "Leave?" She blinks twice, mulling over your words. Then: "Officer, I must *insist* that you tell me what you've uncovered! I can't just leave everything on a whim..."

links.title: Suggestion: "Maybe it's best to tell her the tru..."
links.text: Maybe it's best to tell her the truth after all. Here we go...

links.title: You: ""Farewell for now, book peddler!" [..."
links.text: "Farewell for now, book peddler!" [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Plaisance: ""Oh my god, things have gotten out..."
dialogueTree.text: "Oh my god, things have gotten out of hand!" She unloads immediately: "I thought the psychic stuff was bad, but the crime... it's even worse. I haven't been able to come to work for *three days*, the shop has been locked. No sales, gang-bangers running around, shooting everyone. I know I shouldn't have bought a shop in this *ghetto*."

links.title: You: ""Hey, I'm the one who got shot here..."
links.text: "Hey, I'm the one who got shot here. In the leg... *and* in the shoulder!"

links.title: Plaisance: ""Oh my god, even the *police* can't..."
links.text: "Oh my god, even the *police* can't take care of all this. Just look at you! You're a wreck. Someone should do something about this." She rubs her pendant between two fingers, thinking.

links.title: Plaisance: ""Maybe... I should close the bookst..."
links.text: "Maybe... I should close the bookstore and open a *psychic studio*! Yes!" She nods to herself. "It makes sense. Crime is the sixth element, you see. The darkest element."

links.title: Plaisance: ""I could teach people to protect th..."
links.text: "I could teach people to protect themselves against bad energies and to fight crime."

links.title: You: "(Nod.) "Sounds like a plan. Life mu..."
links.text: (Nod.) "Sounds like a plan. Life must go on, after all."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, what Martinaise really needs..."
links.text: "Yes, what Martinaise really needs is more vigilantes roaming the streets."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Exactly. It's a brilliant idea. Th..."
links.text: "Exactly. It's a brilliant idea. Thank you, officer! I'm going to start drawing up business plans right away."

links.title: You: ""Honestly, I'm not sure what to thi..."
links.text: "Honestly, I'm not sure what to think of it."

links.title: Plaisance: ""No, no... you're right, officer! Y..."
links.text: "No, no... you're right, officer! You've convinced me -- it is a great idea! Thank you for the inspiration."

links.title: Plaisance: ""In the meantime, do buy the books...."
links.text: "In the meantime, do buy the books. As many as you can. They won't be here for much longer." Determination shines in her eyes. "Is there anything else I can help you with?"

links.title: You: ""A 'psychic studio'? This is even w..."
links.text: "A 'psychic studio'? This is even worse than a bookstore in Martinaise..."

links.title: Plaisance: ""No need to be modest, good officer..."
links.text: "No need to be modest, good officer. You've convinced me -- it is a great idea! Thank you for the inspiration."

links.title: You: ""Uh... I'm the one who got shot her..."
links.text: "Uh... I'm the one who got shot here, ma'am."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Oh my god, even the *police* can't..."
links.text: "Oh my god, even the *police* can't take care of all this... just look at that limp! Someone should do something about this." She rubs her pendant between two fingers, thinking.

links.title: You: "Say nothing, stare at her."
links.text: Say nothing, stare at her.

links.title: Plaisance: ""And you... oh my god, just look at..."
links.text: "And you... oh my god, just look at you! It looks like even the *police* can't take care of all this. Someone should do something about this." She rubs her pendant between two fingers, thinking.

dialogueTree.title: Plaisance: ""Hello again, esteemed officer," sh..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hello again, esteemed officer," she keeps reciting like a robot. "And welcome to Crime, Romance, and Biographies of Famous People."

dialogueTree.title: Plaisance: ""Hello again, esteemed officer. And..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hello again, esteemed officer. And welcome to Crime, Romance, and Biographies of Famous People." Her stare is cold and harsh but the line remains the same.

dialogueTree.title: Plaisance: "She's breathing heavily, trying to..."
dialogueTree.text: She's breathing heavily, trying to calm herself. Slowly, she regains composure -- but she still can't get a word out.

dialogueTree.title: Plaisance: ""Hello again, esteemed officer. And..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hello again, esteemed officer. And welcome to Crime, Romance, and Biographies of Famous People."

dialogueTree.title: Plaisance: ""What have you found?" She seems an..."
dialogueTree.text: "What have you found?" She seems anxious. "And also, do buy the books. There may be *teachings* in them."

dialogueTree.title: Plaisance: ""You... broke down the back door?"..."
dialogueTree.text: "You... broke down the back door?" She looks sad and confused. "Why? I gave you the key."

links.title: You: ""Real men don't need keys.""
links.text: "Real men don't need keys."

links.title: Plaisance: ""I hope you can find the solution q..."
links.text: "I hope you can find the solution quickly. The wards are broken, the passage has been opened..." She shudders. "Now tell me, what's back there?"

links.title: You: ""I'm not sure, I don't know what I..."
links.text: "I'm not sure, I don't know what I was thinking."

links.title: You: ""The door was giving me shit.""
links.text: "The door was giving me shit."

dialogueTree.title: Plaisance: ""You... broke down... the back door..."
dialogueTree.text: "You... broke down... the back door?" She looks very sad, resigned even. "The wards... the door... it's all gone now. Dark psychic energy, leeching onto my shop..."

links.title: You: ""I don't know what I was thinking,..."
links.text: "I don't know what I was thinking, barging in like that..."

links.title: Plaisance: ""I suppose... it's all over now?" H..."
links.text: "I suppose... it's all over now?" Her shoulders slump, as if a heavy burden lies on them. "I guess there's no escape."

links.title: You: ""Well, I've looked around... I can..."
links.text: "Well, I've looked around... I can tell you what I saw."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Okay, I'm willing to listen. We ar..."
links.text: "Okay, I'm willing to listen. We are set on the path... there's little else to do." She shrugs, apparently dejected.

links.title: Composure: "Her faade has dropped. Now you see..."
links.text: Her faade has dropped. Now you see the curiosity behind the fear.

links.title: Plaisance: ""But... before we go on... did you..."
links.text: "But... before we go on... did you encounter *the malignant Entity?*" Her eyes narrow, as she whispers the name.

links.title: You: ""The Entity? No, I don't think so.""
links.text: "The Entity? No, I don't think so."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Yes, the malignant *Entity* that l..."
links.text: "Yes, the malignant *Entity* that lives inside the chimney... It takes the shape of a woman, a witch probably. I've suspected that she knows more about the curse than she lets on ever since I first saw her."

links.title: You: ""You mean the chimney that's part o..."
links.text: "You mean the chimney that's part of the central furnace?"

links.title: Plaisance: ""Yes, I've heard that it's enormous..."
links.text: "Yes, I've heard that it's enormous. She has barricaded herself behind some metal security curtains upstairs... God knows what she's doing there."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Some unnatural magic, I assume." S..."
links.text: "Some unnatural magic, I assume." She shivers. "You should go find the *Entity* and ask what happened to all the companies in the building. And do return to me after you've talked to it. I'm quite *anxious* to know what she has to say about the curse."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If you're really interested in cra..."
links.text: "If you're really interested in cracking this mystery, then we should go back to the furnace. Maybe you could yell into it or something, make some noise? You'll think of something, you always do."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Despite his cool the lieutenant's i..."
links.text: Despite his cool the lieutenant's interested in solving this mystery, too.

links.title: Drama: "You ssshould get back to the furnac..."
links.text: You ssshould get back to the furnace, make some nnnoise.

links.title: You: ""You mean the chimney that's hidden..."
links.text: "You mean the chimney that's hidden behind the metal safety curtains?"

links.title: Plaisance: ""Yes, I've heard that she's barrica..."
links.text: "Yes, I've heard that she's barricaded herself inside... It's connected to the central furnace in the basement, you should go and find it. God knows what she's doing there!"

links.title: You: ""Chimneys aren't big enough for any..."
links.text: "Chimneys aren't big enough for anyone to live there."

links.title: Plaisance: ""No, this chimney is part of the bu..."
links.text: "No, this chimney is part of the building's central furnace and it's enormous. She has barricaded herself behind some metal security curtains... God knows what she's doing there."

links.title: You: ""Chimney... the passage between hea..."
links.text: "Chimney... the passage between heaven and hell, of course. It all makes sense now!"

links.title: Plaisance: ""Yes, that chimney is part of the b..."
links.text: "Yes, that chimney is part of the building's central furnace and it's enormous. She has barricaded herself behind some metal security curtains... God knows what she's doing there."

links.title: You: ""Of course, the Entity..." (Close y..."
links.text: "Of course, the Entity..." (Close your eyes.) "I didn't see her, but I sensed her presence."

links.title: Plaisance: ""You did?" She gasps. "Then it has..."
links.text: "You did?" She gasps. "Then it has be true... I've suspected that this woman-shaped energy must be connected to the curse ever since I first saw her. Did you see that she lives inside the *chimney*?"

links.title: You: ""It was the only way to get this in..."
links.text: "It was the only way to get this investigation going."

links.title: You: ""What are you talking about? It's j..."
links.text: "What are you talking about? It's just a door."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Just a door?! This place is cursed..."
links.text: "Just a door?! This place is cursed, detective! They don't call it the Doomed Commercial Area for nothing -- just look at the sheer amount of companies that have failed in this house!"

links.title: Plaisance: ""I hope you're happy now, happy tha..."
links.text: "I hope you're happy now, happy that you've *ruined* everything... Now that you've broken the door the curse is coming to get *me* as well." She closes her eyes and starts mumbling something to her pendant.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): ""Host Almighty," she prays, "guard..."
links.text: "Host Almighty," she prays, "guard me and my honest business venture from the curse that lurks behind the door, blessed be your name..."

links.title: You: ""Oh, sorry, I didn't know about the..."
links.text: "Oh, sorry, I didn't know about the curse."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Of course you didn't, you're nothi..."
links.text: "Of course you didn't, you're nothing but a policeman." She shrugs, visibly dejected.

links.title: Plaisance: ""Alright, you know what? I'm willin..."
links.text: "Alright, you know what? I'm willing to let you investigate the Doomed Commercial Area. We are set on the path... there's little else to do."

links.title: Composure: "Her faade has dropped. Now you see..."
links.text: Her faade has dropped. Now you see the curiosity behind the fear.

links.title: Plaisance: ""But... before we go on, tell me......"
links.text: "But... before we go on, tell me... did you encounter *the malignant Entity?*" Her eyes narrow, as she whispers the name.

links.title: You: ""Cursed? But I thought the curse wa..."
links.text: "Cursed? But I thought the curse wasn't real."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Of course you did, you're nothing..."
links.text: "Of course you did, you're nothing but a policeman." She shrugs, visibly dejected.

links.title: You: ""Cursed? But curses aren't real, ma..."
links.text: "Cursed? But curses aren't real, ma'am."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Of course you would think that, yo..."
links.text: "Of course you would think that, you're nothing but a policeman." She shrugs, visibly dejected.

links.title: You: ""Sometimes it's necessary to resort..."
links.text: "Sometimes it's necessary to resort to extreme measures."

links.title: You: ""Look, I've got this decomposing bo..."
links.text: "Look, I've got this decomposing body I *really* need to put in a fridge down there."

links.title: Plaisance: ""You fool! You've gone and unleashe..."
links.text: "You fool! You've gone and unleashed unimaginable evil, all for the sake of a refrigerator!"

dialogueTree.title: Plaisance: ""You're alive and well! Don't keep..."
dialogueTree.text: "You're alive and well! Don't keep me waiting now. What's in there?" She's looking for the right expression. "In that dark sarcophagus?"

links.title: You: ""The dark sarcophagus..." (Pause dr..."
links.text: "The dark sarcophagus..." (Pause dramatically.)

links.title: Plaisance: ""Yes, yes? How was it?""
links.text: "Yes, yes? How was it?"

links.title: Drama: "Tell her how *ghasssstly* it was! Y..."
links.text: Tell her how *ghasssstly* it was! You know it's what she wantssss to hear...

links.title: You: ""It was a charnel house of failed b..."
links.text: "It was a charnel house of failed business enterprises, leeching life energy from this bookstore."

links.title: Plaisance: ""I knew it!" A tremor runs through..."
links.text: "I knew it!" A tremor runs through her. "Oh, such horrors that have been thrust upon us..." She shakes her head.

links.title: You: ""Honestly -- a dump. Nothing to see..."
links.text: "Honestly -- a dump. Nothing to see there, just heaps of garbage. Someone should let the sunshine in."

links.title: Plaisance: ""But... what else did you find? Did..."
links.text: "But... what else did you find? Did anything survive? No. Of course not. Have you located the... Entity?"

links.title: Logic: "You don't have anything of substanc..."
links.text: You don't have anything of substance to tell her until you've found that *Entity* of hers.

links.title: You: ""I am in no position to give out pe..."
links.text: "I am in no position to give out personal opinions."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Please, do tell! Did anything surv..."
links.text: "Please, do tell! Did anything survive? Have you located the... Entity?"

links.title: You: ""Hold on, I actually haven't done a..."
links.text: "Hold on, I actually haven't done anything yet. I just wanted to ask a few questions."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Oh." Her disappointment is obvious..."
links.text: "Oh." Her disappointment is obvious. "What about?"

dialogueTree.title: Plaisance: ""Welcome to Crime, Romance, and Bio..."
dialogueTree.text: "Welcome to Crime, Romance, and Biographies of Famous People. My name is Plaisance." The clerk extends a greeting.

links.title: Plaisance: ""Be welcome -- and *please* take re..."
links.text: "Be welcome -- and *please* take responsibility for the energy you bring into this space."

links.title: Inland Empire: "A golden pendant hangs around the w..."
links.text: A golden pendant hangs around the woman's neck, in the shape of what looks like a tiny fish head trapped in amber.

links.title: Composure: "Her face looks powdery and painted..."
links.text: Her face looks powdery and painted from all the make-up.

links.title: You: ""Before we go on... you seem to be..."
links.text: "Before we go on... you seem to be well off enough, can you give me some money? I feel there won't be an opportune moment to ask later."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Sir! Don't be ridiculous. I certai..."
links.text: "Sir! Don't be ridiculous. I certainly will not give you money." She gives you a disapproving look. "I would be doing you a grave psychic disfavour..."

links.title: Plaisance: ""One has to earn one's success, eve..."
links.text: "One has to earn one's success, even if one is a police officer. Handouts are nothing but manipulation, all they do is make you dependent."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Certainly there are good things to..."
links.text: Certainly there are good things to be said about dependence.

links.title: You: ""It would forge ties between us wor..."
links.text: "It would forge ties between us working people -- good practice for fighting our common enemy."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Now hey there." She raises her fin..."
links.text: "Now hey there." She raises her finger. "Sounds like someone isn't taking responsibility for the energy they bring into this space..."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Fighting, enemy... my philosophy i..."
links.text: "Fighting, enemy... my philosophy is everyone just getting along."

links.title: You: ""You misunderstand me. I'm a powerf..."
links.text: "You misunderstand me. I'm a powerful feudal lord. I demand tribute. This is about traditions."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Now hey there." She raises her fin..."
links.text: "Now hey there." She raises her finger. "Sounds like someone isn't taking responsibility for the energy they bring into this space..."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Tribute, power... these are not th..."
links.text: "Tribute, power... these are not the traditions we're used to in this part of the world."

links.title: You: ""Damn, you're right. What kind of a..."
links.text: "Damn, you're right. What kind of a business relationship would that kick-start?"

links.title: Plaisance: ""Exactly. In this kind of a busines..."
links.text: "Exactly. In this kind of a business relationship I could come and critique your work any time. I could demand things from you, limiting your creative freedom."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We wouldn't want that.""
links.text: "We wouldn't want that."

links.title: You: ""Excuse me, I don't even know why I..."
links.text: "Excuse me, I don't even know why I said that. A lapse of professionalism that does not represent my values."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Oh my. Of course." She looks at yo..."
links.text: "Oh my. Of course." She looks at you and adds, "What a man."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "She's energetically impressed with..."
links.text: She's energetically impressed with you and your values. This is sincere. She's the kind of person who believes in telling a man that he's *quite the man* while he's being very manly.

links.title: Authority: "What is this insolence? She misunde..."
links.text: What is this insolence? She misunderstood.

links.title: You: "No, that's not *me*."
links.text: No, that's not *me*.

links.title: Authority: "Of course. No one puts words in *yo..."
links.text: Of course. No one puts words in *your* mouth.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Son, you got destroyed there. What..."
links.text: Son, you got destroyed there. What an idiot you are...

links.title: You: ""A curious pendant you're wearing."..."
links.text: "A curious pendant you're wearing." (Narrow your eyes mysteriously.)

links.title: Plaisance: ""Oh yes, helps to have an anchor in..."
links.text: "Oh yes, helps to have an anchor in these times." She clutches the pendant and narrows her eyes as well.

links.title: You: ""So, are you the owner of this stor..."
links.text: "So, are you the owner of this store?"

links.title: Plaisance: ""I am. The proudest owner of our li..."
links.text: "I am. The proudest owner of our little shop of culture." Her voice is high-pitched, as if to give it more penetration.

links.title: Suggestion: "She has fine-tuned her voice to fin..."
links.text: She has fine-tuned her voice to find the most welcoming approach for attracting new customers. It doesn't work.

links.title: You: ""No thanks." [Leave.]"
links.text: "No thanks." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Plaisance: ""You've hurt yourself now! I told y..."
dialogueTree.text: "You've hurt yourself now! I told you not to mess around back there. What are you even trying to accomplish, you fool?!"

links.title: You: ""Nothing... I'm just terribly clums..."
links.text: "Nothing... I'm just terribly clumsy sometimes, sorry." (Rub your aching forehead.)

links.title: Plaisance: ""You're only making things worse! S..."
links.text: "You're only making things worse! Stop it. Be compelled to look at the *books*." She fiddles with her pendant. "*Go to them*!"

links.title: You: ""I thought it was obvious: I tried..."
links.text: "I thought it was obvious: I tried to smash through the door by using pure physical force."

links.title: You: ""I need to know what *secrets* lie..."
links.text: "I need to know what *secrets* lie behind the door... It's part of a *spiritual quest*."

links.title: You: ""I'm trying to find a way to the fr..."
links.text: "I'm trying to find a way to the fridge downstairs -- it's an urgent police matter."

dialogueTree.title: Plaisance: ""I wasn't kidding when I said we're..."
dialogueTree.text: "I wasn't kidding when I said we're para-psychologically done! You clearly don't care about the consequences. What gives you the right?"

links.title: You: ""I am the law.""
links.text: "I am the law."

links.title: Plaisance: ""Don't expect my help from now on...."
links.text: "Don't expect my help from now on. The back door is locked and I threw away the key. I won't trifle with such forces." She fiddles with her pendant.

links.title: Plaisance: ""Do look at the books, though. The..."
links.text: "Do look at the books, though. The books compel you. You *may* be able to make up for this by buying a lot of books. I hope you're a voracious reader!"

links.title: You: ""I'm a rebel -- I live by my own ru..."
links.text: "I'm a rebel -- I live by my own rules."

links.title: You: ""I detected psychic emanations from..."
links.text: "I detected psychic emanations from within and was compelled to investigate."

links.title: You: ""I don't know. Nothing really. I do..."
links.text: "I don't know. Nothing really. I don't have any right, I'm sorry."
